> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

A specific field of a structured [EIP-712](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-712) type.

## Properties

| Property | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `name` | `string` | The field name. |
| `type` | `string` | The type of the field. |
